name: Pure - UI Kit (Free Demo)
description:
Pure is the UI Kit for Figma, which includes a social network messenger. By purchasing a kit, you can easily create your next product around corporate messaging faster and easier!


Purchase


The kit includes:

- 80+ Screens in total

- Color variable design

- 8 exclusively drawn illustrations

- More than 50 unique and made from scratch icons

- Small design system & style guide
